title: American Rising Star Riccitello Shakes Off Vuelta Crash: ‘There Are Still A Lot of Good Stages for Me’
content:
'I'm OK, just road rash': Climbing specialist is already looking toward the second half of the race to chase a stage victory after spill derails GC ambitions.

Read the full article at American Rising Star Riccitello Shakes Off Vuelta Crash: ‘There Are Still A Lot of Good Stages for Me’ on Velo.
author: ahood
